item.description:
Welcome to the "The Power of Meditation" Meetup!

From 6:45 -7:15, we'll meet, mingle, munch food, enjoy drinks and introduce ourselves.

From 7:15 to 9:00 we'll discuss ways of meditation, the health benefits, the success stories and the way incorporating it into daily life.

All members are welcome to join in with the discussion and share their experiences. It is important to attend, whether you are a guru or a beginner this is the right place to be... Just be.

If you have the opportunity bring a picture of someone you love or an item that has sentimental value to you, please do. We will have a relaxing evening with little lessons sprinkled throughout.

In this world of fast movement and addiction to drama we can create our own reality of peace and harmony. Join the group and meet the like mined people that are craving the same thing you are craving, an abundant, blissful life.

See you then,
Barb
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for "The Abundance Meetup"

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Law of Attraction- The Power of Meditation
